text: “Eghtɨ ikɨzir igharazibar gumazamizir ian tongɨn itibar tav, dagɨaba bar izɨvagham, eghtɨ ia Israelia, ian tav onganarazibagh amir gumazimɨn mɨn otoghɨva, a ikɨzir igharazimɨn gumazir kam ateghtɨ an a givezeghtɨ, an an ingangarir gumazir kɨnimɨn mɨn ikiam, o gumazir kamɨn tavɨn ingangarir gumazimɨn mɨn otogham.
